channel.title: SSO[SabsabiOnline]
channel.description:
[B]Server Base[/B]: WinterLove [B]Client Base[/B]: 317 Deob [B]Data Loaded[/B]: 474 items, NPC's, animations, gfx's, IDK [center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R7vYw.png[/img]
[B]SabsabiOnline started out back in 2008 with a basic server, the server wasn't too popular back then. However that all changed in 2009, that's when the server reached a maximum player amount of 70. In 2010, SabsabiOnline reached a maximum player amount of 200, late in 2010 we ruled out every server on the toplists, we peaked with 1000 players at maximum. Further on JaGex tried to shutdown SabsabiOnline but that didn't get to happen(I'd rather not go into details about why not).[/B]
[b][size=18pt]Today's SabsabiOnline[/size][/b] This time SabsabiOnline strive for perfection and fun for everyone, we mix the best things of both worlds, by that I mean loading 474 data using a 317 deob client, basicly using the 317 gameframe but loading 474 data through the cache, this way you still get the ol' school feel whilst playing and further on the newer players can enjoy the game too
[IMG]http://puu.sh/1Syhr[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/1O4jh[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qAc9c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hk6eY.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/1M9iO[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/14kMn.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: SSO[SabsabiOnline]
item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:21, topic:479666”]Unique title, I like it.

As for the content posted, it looks good for your first set of content, I’m hoping you are releasing more soon.

As for the logo, you really should change it, saying “Fuck Jagex” is not a real attracting aspect, it just shows that you dislike Jagex. I don’t necessarily like Jagex either, but my logo would be something among the lines of “Creating a better private server”[/quote]

There has been alot of debate about the logo. We’re considering getting our designer to change it up, however it does not seem like people aren’t attracted to the project due to the slogan, we’ve reached over 100 online at one time on the forum. Atm there’s around 50 online.

Read full topic

item.title: SSO[SabsabiOnline]
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Unique title, I like it.

As for the content posted, it looks good for your first set of content, I’m hoping you are releasing more soon.

As for the logo, you really should change it, saying “Fuck Jagex” is not a real attracting aspect, it just shows that you dislike Jagex. I don’t necessarily like Jagex either, but my logo would be something among the lines of “Creating a better private server”

Read full topic

item.title: SSO[SabsabiOnline]
item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:12, topic:479666”][quote author=TimeTM link=topic=597901.msg4208083#msg4208083 date=1359206041]

your tabs don’t go with the rest of your client

Do you care to give me some more details about what you mean?
[/quote]

You’re using 474 graphics and a 474 map back, and your tabs are from 317[/quote]

The entire gameframe is 317, we’re only loading 474 items, NPC’s, animations, gfx’s and IDK.

[quote=“Flame_, post:13, topic:479666”]I think that is what he was aiming for.

TimeTM:

using the 317 gameframe but loading 474 data through the cache, this way you still get the ol’ school feel whilst playing and further on the newer players can enjoy the game too[/quote]

The ability to use common sense is something they lack I guess.

RiiPiiNFtW:

Lol, thats the default swing theme. Don’t play smart ass with me.

Awh, e-thug.

Read full topic

item.title: SSO[SabsabiOnline]
item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:7, topic:479666”][quote author=TimeTM link=topic=597901.msg4208050#msg4208050 date=1359197446]

[quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=597901.msg4207762#msg4207762 date=1359164086]

Never have, never will support. Your logo makes me thing this project is ran by immature 13 year olds, and client theme is terribly ugly.

Thats just my two cents, good luck.

Client theme? You mean the gameframe? Okay then.

About the logo, I can really see how that makes it look like it’s ran by thirteen year old’s, great logic buddy.
[/quote]No not the gameframe you dip shit, the theme. The default swing theme is horrid. Import a custom one. The logo makes me think of immaturity by having a “fuck Jagex” slogan in it. Thats unprofessional and immature.

The client use no such thing as a theme, you must be talking about the gameframe. I’d say that you’re the one who are immature.

It looks OK. You should add more of what you have in the server (like content) because it is looking a little bland just from those pictures… The only thing I can say I dislike about this is the slogan. IMO, kind of unprofessional, but not as bad as some. Good luck!

Sure, it has alot more content, i’ll get around adding some new pictures.
[/quote]Obviously you can’t see or read. See that shitty blue theme around your game play? Yea, thats ugly. Get a new one.[/quote]

You mean the jframe? You could’ve just said so, instead of yapping around about something you don’t know anything about.

However I don’t plan on using the Jframe when the server gets released.

Read full topic

Data Loaded: 474 items, NPC’s, animations, gfx’s, IDK
[center]

SabsabiOnline started out back in 2008 with a basic server, the server wasn’t too popular back then. However that all changed in 2009, that’s when the server reached a maximum player amount of 70. In 2010, SabsabiOnline reached a maximum player amount of 200, late in 2010 we ruled out every server on the toplists, we peaked with 1000 players at maximum. Further on JaGex tried to shutdown SabsabiOnline but that didn’t get to happen(I’d rather not go into details about why not).

[size=18pt]Today’s SabsabiOnline[/size]
This time SabsabiOnline strive for perfection and fun for everyone, we mix the best things of both worlds, by that I mean loading 474 data using a 317 deob client, basicly using the 317 gameframe but loading 474 data through the cache, this way you still get the ol’ school feel whilst playing and further on the newer players can enjoy the game too
